articles.title: U.S., NATO start formal troop withdrawal from Afghanistan after 20 years in country - CBC.ca
articles.description: The final phase of ending America's "forever war" in Afghanistan after 20 years formally began Saturday, with the withdrawal of the last U.S. and NATO troops by the end of summer.
articles.content:
The final phase of ending America's "forever war" in Afghanistan after 20 years formally began Saturday, with the withdrawal of the last U.S. and NATO troops by the end of summer.

articles.title: TSA Keeps Face Mask Requirement On Public Transportation Through September : Coronavirus Updates - NPR
articles.description: Even as COVID-19 cases decrease and more Americans get vaccinated, the Transportation Security Administration is keeping strict regulations on wearing masks when traveling domestically.
articles.content:
For about a year, major U.S. commercial airlines have required all passengers who are older than 2 to wear face masks on flights.
Joe Raedle/Getty Images

articles.title: WHO approves Moderna COVID-19 vaccine for emergency use - Euronews
articles.description: The American-made vaccine joins AstraZeneca, Pfizer-BioNTech and Johnson & Johnson in receiving the WHO's emergency use listing.
articles.content:
The World Health Organization has given the go-ahead for emergency use of Moderna’s COVID-19 vaccine.
